channel.title: First and only Skoll Fun kill o.0
channel.description:
Hey guys, Today about 6 hours ago I solo'd Skoll with a bronze weapon. Don't think anyone has done that yet. All I saw on Yt was maxed out peeps ss'ing it(even in guides which is silly cause its a guide lol) so I thought I'd give it a go. Didn't use SS neither:P. I didn't do too great as I never realised his mage attack was so fast(2.6tics same as scimmy and most i 5tics so its basically fire surge but two times the speed=two times the str) and I was trying to get him to mage me and not melee me cause I was in Void = low def and I'm 73 def too. Solo'ing(with a proper weapon etc) usually would be okayish, could do it on normal food but I thought it was an achievement but I can most definitely tell you it was harder that Nomad at 85 Combat haha.
If you want to see the video this is the link (yes I know I can't edit at all:L..) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ba2VTsmEeMg&feature=youtu.be Discuss if you'd say its achievement cause there's a lot of different views of Hati + Skoll being easy/hard.

@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Hey guys,
Today about 6 hours ago I solo’d Skoll with a bronze weapon. Don’t think anyone has done that yet. All I saw on Yt was maxed out peeps ss’ing it(even in guides which is silly cause its a guide lol) so I thought I’d give it a go. Didn’t use SS neither:P. I didn’t do too great as I never realised his mage attack was so fast(2.6tics same as scimmy and most i 5tics so its basically fire surge but two times the speed=two times the str) and I was trying to get him to mage me and not melee me cause I was in Void = low def and I’m 73 def too. Solo’ing(with a proper weapon etc) usually would be okayish, could do it on normal food but I thought it was an achievement but I can most definitely tell you it was harder that Nomad at 85 Combat haha.

If you want to see the video this is the link (yes I know I can’t edit at all:L…) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ba2VTsmEeMg&feature=youtu.be
Discuss if you’d say its achievement cause there’s a lot of different views of Hati + Skoll being easy/hard.
